content.en: Phase Retrieval Advances: Researchers are exploring various algorithms to address challenges in phase retrieval, a process of reconstructing signals from limited measurements. These algorithms, such as compressed sensing, vectorial phase retrieval, and GESPAR, offer accurate and efficient solutions for reconstructing sparse signals and recovering phase information from magnitude measurements. Recent advances in phase retrieval include the development of new algorithms, connections, and applications, providing insights into this important field of research.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for fasegenvinding: Forskere undersøger forskellige algoritmer for at tackle udfordringer i fasegenvinding, en proces med at rekonstruere signaler fra begrænsede målinger. Disse algoritmer, såsom komprimeret sensing, vektoriel fasegenvinding og GESPAR, tilbyder præcise og effektive løsninger til at rekonstruere sparsomme signaler og genvinde faseinformation fra størrelsesmålinger. Nylige fremskridt inden for fasegenvinding inkluderer udviklingen af nye algoritmer, forbindelser og anvendelser, hvilket giver indsigt i dette vigtige forskningsfelt.
